Sonoko pondered the statement. Are the effects not permanent? Will she go back to normal if she takes the headband off? She thought. Doctor Wesber then said, "If she ever takes the headband off, don't let her put it back on." That statement caught Sonoko off guard. Okay. She won't go back to how she was before. She thought. She then asked the doctor, "What will happen if she does put it back on?"

The doctor then said, "I don't really know for certain, but it's most likely the same thing that would happen if Lan were to have worn the band. If you let her put it back on in the event that she takes it off, you'll more than likely find out what will happen."

Sonoko said, "Alright. I'll make sure to swap out the headband the moment I get the chance." With that, Sonoko and doctor Wesber disconnect.

Meanwhile, Ran and Lan were still pondering their choices. Sonoko had laid out clothes for them to wear, but she also had some clothes in her closet that also looked nice. they just could decide what would be better to wear.

“Now that’s what I call a finish with a bang. Well done to the competitors 16 and 17 for their incredible performance. 1112111111111111111112112111221111211211.title: A knowledge contest

1112111111111111111112112111221111211211.content:
“All right folks it’s time for the QUIZ SHOW” the announcer proclaimed.

“Now let me explain the rules: our two contestants will take turn answering questions of generic subjects; do not worry you two” The announcer said to Ran and Lan and then he continued “we are not going to ask you questions that will normally go beyond the knowledge of high school girls.” That news made Ran and Lan feel relieved.

“ Now here ‘s the catch, the winner will be the first one that will score 7 points, but you can make points ONLY on those question that your opponent did not answer or gave the wrong answer. So be careful on your mistakes girls” The announcer finished the explanation.

“Well, it could have been worse” Sonoko thought relieved.

“So girls ready to go?” The announcer asked.

“YES” Both Ran and Lan answered together.

“Well then, it’s QUIZ TIME!!!” The announcer screamed.
1112111111111111111112112111221111211211.title: A quiz

1112111111111111111112112111221111211211.content:
“Oh man. I almost forgot one last rule of our quiz show.” The announcer said, and with that he turned around and talked to the twins.

“You see girls, the subject of your quizzes will not be completely random” the announcer explained and then he turned around to the public.

“You see folks, on the big screen right behind us, each time it will be the turn for one of our beautiful contender to answer a quiz four random subjects will appear, like history, music, mathematic etc.. Now here is the cherry on the cake. It will be you people, thanks to the remotes that you will find in the arm of the chairs on which you are seating, that will decide the subject of the question for each girl” The announcer finished explaining causing a big round of applause.

“And as I said earlier, the only way for our two contenders to make points is when their opponents fails. Now any question Ran and Lan?” The announcer asked the two girls.

“Nope. All clear” Both Ran and Lan answered together.

“Good. And what about you folks?” The announcer asked to the crowd. No response.

“Well then, and this time for real, it’s QUIZ TIME” the announcer screamed.
1112111111111111111112112111221111211211.title: One last rule

“Indeed we have” Tamura responded and with that they shacked hands.

She unlocked the drawer. 'After what happened yesterday, I can't be too careful.'

The book was still in the drawer. "Good. hasn't even been touched." Rachel then closed the drawer and walked downstairs. it was a weekend, so there wasn't any school.

As she got down, she saw Hana and Lana together watching television. They appeared to be watching a fantasy sci-fi. It looked as if it had just ended. "That was an amazing one. I loved how the princess used her magic to counter the sorcerer's." Hana said. "That was nice," Lana said. "Of course, she did have help. Her magic alone wasn't enough. she had to also use the machine built by her friend to strengthen her own magic power. This episode proved the importance of both magic and science."

Rachel was surprised by Lana's statement. Although she looked like Hana, she didn't come close to having the same personality as her. She noticed a science book next to Lana and a fairy tail book next to Hana. "Something that annoyed me was the princess's sister acting like her physical appearance mattered the most. It's like I said yesterday, sister. If someone likes you solely for how you look, their not worth the trouble." Lana said as she pointed to Hana's chest. "What matters is what's in there..." She then proceeded to put her finger on her head. "... or here." She then notices Rachel. "Or in special cases like big sister, both of those things." Rachel smiled at what Lana said. 'She sees me as kind and smart. I'm already liking her as much as Hana. Still it looks like the spell made them fraternal twins. She doesn't act exactly like Hana, and I can see a few differences in how she looks.' Rachel noticed that both Hana and Lana were getting along just fine. 'At least they're happy. I like the change in Lana too.Instead of being obsessed with her body, she prefers to have people know her for her mind.'

Just then, Hana and Lana walked up to Rachel. "Big sis, maybe you could go with us to an event our school is holding." Lana said. Hana nodded and said, "Yeah! It sounds like fun. We asked daddy, but he's too busy with with his work to take us." Lana then pulled out a flyer. "Everyone from my science club will be there. Including George, Mitch, Isaac, and our sister's boyfriend, Andy." Hana blushes. Rachel sighs. 'Okay. So now there's now a science club and Lana is the the president. Sounds like the other girl in there has turned into a boy now too.' She had a feeling that there were going to be even more changes to reality.

The burning in his cheeks made his furry with the situation and the two men in black bubble back up.A grimace twisted his lips unattractively as he stomped down from his parent's bedroom to the library.

He slung his duffel into the chair behind his father's desk and paused.The wild anger that had been bubbling up slowly calmed as he breathed deeply, inhaling the musty scent of the thousands of books the room housed.This was the place that where he had begun to develop under the tutelage of Sherlock Holmes and other great detectives.
111331111112111111.title: My continue

1113311111121111111.content:
A creak from the library door drew his attention,breaking his moment of serenity.Shinichi tensed automatically.Who was in the house?The men in black?Had they already realized he was not dead?

The door opened further and,instead of a tall black swathed figure,Agasa came in looking worried.Shinichi mentally laughed at his own paranoia.

"What's wrong Professor?"

"I called Ran to tell her that you won't be home for awhile,but no one answered the phone.I'm worried that she might doing something rash."Agasa answered.

Shinichi laughed off the other's worry."The most she can do is to come looking for me.She can't really file a missing person's report unless she has a good reason to believe I'm missing.Even then I wouldn't be given top priority to be found unless it suspected that I am in danger."Shinichi said.

Neither of them said anything after that,both lost in their own thoughts.Shinichi stared at the books lining the walls and wondered what his heroes would do,while Agasa worried that Ran might really come looking for Shinichi before they could figure out what to do.A faint knock and then the sound of a door opening and shutting sounded down the hall,though neither paid it any notice until a familiar voice called out.

"Shinichi are you home?"

To be continue ...
1113311111121111111.title: My continue

11133111111211111111.content:
Detective and doctor shared a look of utter surprise and horror.

"Hide,hide!"Agasa said in a frantic whisper.Shinichi scrambled behind the desk just as the door to the library opened.In his rush,the teen's foot twisted under him,and with a loud crack,he fall back against the bookshelf.

"Are you all right?"Ran asked as she ran into the room.Her eyes fell on Shinichi's crumpled form."Shinichi?"

Ashen faced,Shinichi looked up at Ran."Sorry,wrong person."He said,nervously running a hand through his hair and rubbed the goose-egg forming on his cranium.

"I'm..."

"This is my niece's daughter."Agasa cut in quickly,causing Shinichi to shoot him an irritated glance.


"Is that so?"Ran said wonderingly.For a moment,she had thought it would be something crazy,like Shinichi's long lost twin.Though speaking of the detective geek..."Aren't those Shinichi's clothes?"

Agasa fumbled mentally for an excuse."She was mugged on the train ride here,so I told her to borrow some of Shinichi's clothes,especially since she had nothing dry to change into after the rain last night."He said with a nervous smile on his face.Ran seemed to buy the story and immediately began to fuss about over the gender-switched detective.

To be continue...
11133111111211111111.title: My continue

111331111112111111111.content:
"If that's the case,you can borrow some of my clothes and then we can go buy some new ones.There's is still plenty of time left before the stores close."She said all this with with a sweet smile on her face that caused Shinichi to blush.

"Uh,well ac-"

"Good idea.Please take a good care of her, Ran."Agasa hurried to say before Shinichi could say no.

Nodding her acceptance of responsibility over the boy turned girl to Agasa,Ran turned back to Shinichi."Oh by the way I'm Ran Mouri."

Shinichi forced a smile onto his face as he tried to think of a name.It would be rude not to answer her after she introduced herself.Looking behind him,a book on the shelf to the left of him caught his attention and he blurted out,"Edogawa...Edogawa-"

"Mary."Agasa finished."She's a bit shy, Ran and has basically lived a boy's lifestyle in previous years,so please excuse her oddities."

Ran looked back and forth between them,confused by all the interruptions kept making.It was almost as if they were covering something up.
"It's nice to meet you,Mary!"

Shinichi smiled wryly.The world as he knew it was crumbling before his very eyes."Ah,it's nice to meet you too,Ran."

To be continue...

11311222.content:
Instead of a six year old child, she only found a baby shakingly standing upright in a pile of clothes that Conan had previously worn. He was only 12 inches tall anymore, at best.

The baby noticed Haibara standing in the door. "Hababa?" He blabbered.

"Kudo-kun... is that still you inside there?" Haibara asked.

Conan took a second to respond, nervously moving his lips without saying anything until he finally muttered: "Y-yesh.."

"Okay, that's good, but your body still has shrunken even more..." She closed the distance between them and picked him up. "I'd guess youa ren't much older than one year in this current form."

"Wahhh," Conan cried when she picked up his tiny, naked form, but Haibara ignored his screams and carried him to the living room of the Agasa household. The Professor was gone for a special repair job today, so Haibara was alone with Conan.

She put him down next to her laptop. "Alright, it seems you struggle with speaking and standing, but the rest of your mind seems unaffected. Try to type a sentence."

Conan looked at the keyboard for a moment, before reaching out with his hand and smashing them onto the letters, hesitant at first, but then quickly faster and with more confidence.

"How long will this antidote last?," Haibara read out loud what he wrote on the screen. "Cutting down right to it, even as a baby, huh? Truth to be told, I don't quite know... since the effect of the APTX worsened this time instead of improving, it might even last forever until another cure... again..."

Conan's eyes widened in shock. It might last?! I'd have to stay a one year old baby...?! As if shrinking to six years hadn't been bad enough...

"Welp, let's get you dressed first..." Haibara picked Conan up again and carried him over to a table, where she pulled a pair of diapers from a drawer.

"Wahh, whaaaa...?!?!" Conan shrieked.

"What, whaaaa? Your are currently a naked baby." Haibara paused for a moment and opened a pack of diapers, in which only now Conan appeared to realize his nakedness, blushing madly over his younger cheeks. "No need for shame, seeing naked baby boys it's not something special or anything," a grin curled up in her face briefly, remembering that one time Conan saw her six year old body naked and she exposing his butt to herself and Ayumi in revenge, "and since you appear to lack control over basic functions like walking, talking and probably peeing and pooping as well, and I'm not gonna let you ruin our carpet."

Oi oi, Conan thought, still stricken wiht embarassment.

Suddenly, the still naked Conan baby and Haibara with the diaper still in her hand heard the door of Agasa's house open and someone yelling, "Hellooo, Professor, are you there?"

The ones coming into the house and stumbling into the diapering were...

Sadly, the badge was not in range.
Next they check on the memory function. They saw the five badges together at first, before they split up. Shortly before the badge that must be Mitsuhikos reaches his home, it takes a complete other route and that much faster then Mitsuhiko would have been by foot.
"So he was kidnapped by someone. He was taken to the west of Tokio, maybe outside of it. There is the forest, good to keep someone or something hidden."
Ten minutes later, the professor, Conan and Ai were driving to the forest, with Conan looking for Mitsuhikos badge with his glasses.

Mitsuhiko had found his way to the road and was following it behind the trees. "No need to be seen by this kidnappers." He only hope that it was a way back to Tokio and not the wrong way.

Shortly after reaching the forest, Conans glasses get the signal of the badge. "There it is. He is moving slowly in our direction, maybe he escaped them. Professor, we have to stop and search for him."
155122221111111122.title: Mitsuhikos badge is not in range

1551222211111111221.content:
After getting out of the car, the professor and Ai follow Conan through the forest. "He should be near" was all Conan said, but Mitsuhiko had heard him. He runs in the direction of the voice. "He is heading our way."
Shortly after, on a small clearing, they found each other. The trio looks surprised and a little bit confused that a black cat has Mitsuhikos Detective Boys badge in his mouth, while Mitsuhiko runs up to them. Ai bends down to pet the cat.
"Where did you get that, little cat? Can you show us?" asks Ai. To their surprise it looks like the cat is shakes his head. "Can you understand me?" asks Ai surprised now. Now the cat nods.
"That is an interesting cat. But where did it get the badge from Mitsuhiko? And why give it away? Or has he lost it?" Conan was flabbergasted as the cat rise his left front paw in a gesture of "slow down".

Mitsuhiko is trying to answer the questions with nodding and shaking his head, but they ask to fast and that way he can´t explain who he is. After the "slow down" gesture, it gets quiet on the clearing.
1551222211111111221.title: They find him

15512222111111112211.content:
A couple of minutes later Conan asks the cat "Do you know where Mitsuhiko, the boy who's badge you have there is?" Mitsuhiko nods. "But you can't get us to him?" He nods again. "Why? Is it a dangerous place?" First, Mitsuhiko nods before he is shaking his head.
Conan gets an idea. He gets his small notebook and a pencil out and writes down a couple of words. "What are you trying Kudo?" asks Ai. "This cat is clever in a way that I through we try if it can read and answer questions that way." "That's ridiculous. Whatever is with this cat, there is no way it can to such things." "Let try, okay? I know its normally not possible, but trying isn't dangerous, right?"
Conan then asks the cat after laying the book on the ground "Can you read this?" To the others surprise, the cat not only nods, but also tips his right front paw on the word yes on the notebook.
"Interesting. Is Mitsuhiko anywhere near us?" The cat nods again, tapping yes on the book again. "Where is he?" Now the cat does something interesting again. With his left paw, he stands on the t of the word there, while at the same time tapping the words I and there with his right paw.
After thinking about the meaning of this behavior and the words, Conan pales a little and asks shocked "Are you Mitsuhiko?"
Now Ai laughs behind him "That's impossible." But to her shock, the cat nods again and taps yes on the book while also let out a happy "Meow".

"I hope only they understand the meaning of this" through Mitsuhiko as he tips on I and the there without the t. After waiting a minute or so, Conan pales and asks him the question he was waiting and hoping for "Are you Mitsuhiko?" Happily he nods, tips yes and give an "Yes" as answer, but it comes out as "Meow".

"That has to be a joke, right? There is no way Mitsuhiko is a cat now." Ai is shocked. The professor looks unbelieving at Conan and the cat.
"It should be impossible, but our situation should be also, Haibara. It was one small possibility that the kidnappers did give him something to experiment on him. We don't know for sure, but Mitsuhiko could not train a cat this fast to do such things, and this cat was knowing us."

After ten minutes to let it all sink in, Ai asks "And what do we now? Drive home with him and trying a way to change him back while lying to the others where Mitsuhiko is?"
15512222111111112211.title: Trying to comunicate

155122221111111122111.content:
"I think we should drive home and see what happens tomorrow. Its already past ten, nearly eleven, and tomorrow morning Ayumi and Genta will get the news and be there to look for Mitsuhiko." After Conan said that, they drive home. Ai takes Mitsuhiko up in her arms to bring him to the car.
Before they reach the car, Mitsuhiko had fallen asleep in her arms. "He must be really exhaust."
"I guess after he escaped his kidnappers he was running the whole time to get farther away from them. And that after whatever they have done to him."
Once inside the car, they drive home.

At home, they all get to bed. Conan sleeps on the couch because of the loud snores of the professor. Mitsuhiko on a pillow in the living room near Conan without waking up. "I don´t think he should be sleeping with me in my room" was all Ai said as she carefully puts Mitsuhiko on the pillow.
155122221111111122111.title: Do that

1551222211111111221111.content:
Conan is the first to wake up that morning. After seeing the cat on the pillow, he knows that it wasn't a dream. Now, in the light of the slowly rising sun, Conan examines Mitsuhiko closer.
He has white fur on his paws, his tail and his chest, while the rest is black. His head has nearly the same shape as his human shape had been, only smaller. And a little bit of his normal hairstyle was also there if you look close enough.
While Conan examines him, he wakes up slowly. At first, he thinks it was all a weird dream, but after opening his eyes, he nearly drops from his pillow in shock that it was real.
Conan took notice in the behavior of Mitsuhiko and tries to ease him. "We will get you back to normal, Mitsuhiko. Panic won't help us to figure something out."

After about five minutes of Conans tries Mitsuhiko slowly gets calmer.
Shortly after, Ai comes down from her room. Her first way is to get some coffee. After that, she sits down next to Conan on the couch with a cup for him too.
1551222211111111221111.title: The next morning

15512222111111112211111.content:
Conan and Ai drink their coffee in silence while Mitsuhiko drinks some water out of a bowl. "This is embarrassing."
After the cups are empty, they try do decide what to do now. "Ai, do you think you could find something out from Mitsuhikos blood? Or do you think its already to late for that?" "I think it could be to late, but its worth trying. Maybe we have some look."
And so Ai goes to get a syringe from her little lab. Mitsuhiko is not happy, but sees the reason in it. But after getting the blood, Ai goes down again alone where he through that the professor would go with her. The professor does some tinkering after his own cup of coffee, so it is up to Conan to think what he and Mitsuhiko do now.

"She knows what she is doing Mitsuhiko. We should try to find out what to say to Ayumi and Genta once they are here." So he gets some paper and writes down some words and phrases again, but then gets an other idea. He stands up, lifts Mitsuhiko in his arms and goes to the computer. After starting it up and cut the Internet connection, he gets some text program so Mitsuhiko can tip on the keyboard what he wanted to say. "That should be easier for us both." Mitsuhiko meowed approvingly.

"Okay, lets try something easy for you first to see whether this works or not. Type down your name." Mitsuhiko looks at him before typing down his name.
"What should we say to Ayumi and Genta? The truth or some lie?" Without long thinking time, he types "Why should we lie to them" "There could be different reasons. For one, it could be embarrassing for you. Then we don't know what your kidnappers do if they hear you were found. That could put us all in danger and I don't think we all want to end up as cats."
That got Mitsuhiko thinking.
15512222111111112211111.title: Planning what they should do

155122221111111122111111.content:
After some time of thinking, Mitsuhiko types "We should tell them the truth. I trust them to not tell others, and if they know they can be more alert if someone tries to kidnap them."
"Okay, then we will tell them, but first we will talk to Ai about it. How were you taken?" "I only remember being gripped from behind and some cloth in my face before waking ab in that room." "Have you seen someone there?" "Only the scientist who came in after I transformed. He through I would went to him if he is friendly, but after getting out, he was cursing."
"Okay, back to the first topic. What do we tell your parents if we don't get you back to normal in the next few days? Any ideas?"
"I don't know what we could tell them. I think they will not believe us so easily." "Okay, then we will think about something. How should we call you now? If someone hear us call you Mitsuhiko, that could end bad." And so they searched for a name, deciding after some minutes to Hiro, something near the last two syllables of his normal name.
155122221111111122111111.title: We tell them the truth

155122221111111122111112.content:
After a couple of minutes, Mitsuhiko decides "Okay, we will lie to them for now, but I have no idea what you could say to them. At first I will hide somewhere and later we will see."
"We will find something. You forget your badge yesterday so we can't use my glasses to find you. They will want to look for clues, so we will walk your way home and look for something and see whats next. I think we will say the same things to your family." "I would say so. What if Ayumi or Genta ask them something that's different from what you say? Better then they think the same."
While Conan deleted the text Mitsuhiko had typed, they try to think of a name to call him as a cat. "When we call you Mitsuhiko and someone hears us, then there will be questions." After some time they come up with the name Hito, close to his normal names ending, and the two of them head down to see if Ai had found something and to tell her what they had decided.
155122221111111122111112.title: We will lie to them

choices: They took the sleeping cat with them
1551222211111111222.content:
After they got out of the car, Conan lead them with his glasses. "The badge is somewhere near us."
That got Mitsuhikos attention, because he had heard them. He run up to them.
"Look, that cat has the badge of Mitsuhiko" said Ai and got the badge from the cat. "He could be here somewhere, we will split up to cover more of the forest. Professor, take the badge from Mitsuhiko with you so we can keep contact." With that said, the trio split up.
Mitsuhiko himself was sad because they run away. He hadn't through about how they would not recognize him. "How will I get them to believe that I am a cat now if they don't recognize me?" His meows had been ignored by the three.

After about five minutes Mitsuhiko gets back up and walks the way the others had come from. He would just wait at the car and hope that they will take him with them.
When he finally gets there, he needs a few tries to get on the roof so he wouldn't be overlooked by them. "I only hope that they took me with them. Alone here I would need a lot of time to get to the professor."

An hour later the three got back together and head to the car. "We will go back tomorrow with the others and look in the daylight. I just hope that if he really escaped the kidnappers that they don't find him before us."
1551222211111111222.title: They ignore Mitsuhiko

15512222111111112221.content:
When Conan, Ai and the professor came back to the car, they see that the cat from before is deeply sleeping on the roof.
"We can't just drop that cat here, maybe someone had left it here all alone."
So they decide to take the cat with them. Even as the professor takes the cat down and gives it to Ai so he can drive them home, the cat stays asleep.
When they got home, the put the sleeping cat on a pillow near Conans sleeping place on the couch and put a bowl of water next to the pillow on the ground. Then they all went to sleep.

When Conan wakes up the next morning, the cat is still asleep. Conan wonders if the cat had slept the whole night while studying it.
15512222111111112221.title: They took the sleeping cat with them

choices: It's a normal collar for a cat
155122221111112.content:
But it ends up by trying. At the moment Mitsuhiko is to weak from the changes to even stand up, let alone walk.
"Come on, I have to escape from here" he thought, but it was to no avail.

"You will go in and get the cat. Take the boys shirt or something to wrap him in so he won't scratch you. I will get a collar for him."
And so the man who has kidnapped Mitsuhiko walks into the room to get the cat to the scientist.
Outside the scientist is waiting with the collar.
155122221111112.title: Mitsuhiko can´t escape

1551222211111122.content:
Mitsuhiko tries to escape the mans grip, but with being weak and wrapped up in his shirt he has no chance.
After getting out of the room, the man sees the collar in the scientist hands. "That is not a normal collar for a cat."

"No it isn't. Its an experimental one. If it works as it should, it should suppress the boys human mind by impressing the mind of a cat on him, with all instincts etc. and make him obedient to us. And if he wears it long enough the cats aspects will be in him even if we take the collar off. The only things we don't know is if it works as planed and if there are side-effects to the boys mind. Maybe after some time his old human mind will fade completely."
"Isn't that a bit cruel to the boy?" asks the kidnapper.
"I would say it would be crueler to set the cat out in the open with only his human mind. He would die because he can't hunt mice or other prey. He would have to learn to walk, hunt and all the other things the mother would teach him all by himself. And even if it is cruel, we have no way to turn him back, so he will be a human prisoner in a cats body."

Mitsuhiko was now in full panic mode, they want to control him by suppressing or even erasing his human mind, his humanity and his free will. But even in his panic state he wasn't able to escape his fate. Slowly to him the scientist was getting the collar around his neck.
And with it clicked in place, the cats body slowly gets still, much to the panic of the boy inside.
1551222211111122.title: It's some experimental collar

15512222111111221.content:
Both men look at the slowly stilling body of the cat.
"The last step to take would be to name this cat. Only then the collar can start working correctly. If the cat gets no name, the collar only stills the cat but doesn't imprint anything into it. And even if we would have known his human name, that wouldn't fit anymore."
After some time thinking for a name, the scientist decides: "We will call him Shiro."
With that, something seems to click within the cats body and it starts to purr, much to Mitsuhikos horror.
"Bring him to the basket back in the room. He will sleep for the next hours. Then take out the clothes he has worn. We won't need them anymore and without them their is nothing to connect us to the missing boy."
With that, "Shiro" was taken to the basket where the man took him out of the shirt before laying him down. Then he took all of Mitsuhikos things out of the room.

Mitsuhikos panic wasn't decreasing, not even a little. Since he had gotten a new name, the cat was in full control of the body. Nothing he did, from pleading over screaming to crying had done anything. Even with all his will to fight of the cat he had gotten nothing. Not even that the cat had laid down in the basket and become comfortable enough to fall asleep had helped him. It was like he had switched from the drivers seat of his body to one of a passenger that could do nothing but watch.
And with taken away his clothes even his detective boys badge was out of reach even if he could get somehow get a little control back. And if the kidnapper was clever enough he would dispose Mitsuhikos belongings somewhere with no connection to this place. This way not even Conan would find him.
For the next two hours while the cat was sleeping he tried everything he could think of to get the control back, to no avail. Only then he was mentally exhaust enough to fall asleep himself, not even his fear of losing more of himself could keep him awake.
15512222111111221.title: Life as a cat

choices: The next days as a cat
155122221111112211.content:
When Mitsuhiko regains consciousness, his first thought was "What a strange dream, more a nightmare."
Just a couple of seconds later he notices that his body is moving on his own. "It was real?" thought Mitsuhiko in panic as he could feel the cats movements.

He tried again everything he could think of to get the control of his body back, but nothing works. The cat went around the room exploring, unfazed by Mitsuhikos doings and pleadings. Later Shiro went to the litter box before he eats the cat-food that the scientist had brought in, much to Mitsuhikos horror. The food was disgusting for him, because he doesn't like tuna and the food was full of it. And he could do nothing as Shiro then starts to lick himself clean before taking a nap in the basket.
155122221111112211.title: Life as a cat - The next morning

1551222211111122112.content: MAybe see what the others do?
1551222211111122112.title: With the others?

15512222111111221121.content:
The others were searching for Mitsuhiko since the morning of the day after he had vanished. His parents had called Agasa after Mitsuhiko had not been there at nine, asking if he was with them. After hearing that Mitsuhiko wasn't there, there worries raised higher, nearing a full blown panic.
After calming them down it was decided to call the police and meet up in the morning to search for Mitsuhiko.
While the last time Mitsuhiko had vanished there were left clues, this time there was nothing. The professor had tried to increase the range of Conans glasses for the whole night, but it wasn't enough when they started the search.
Beside Mitsuhikos parents there were the other members of the DB's and their parents, the professor, Ran and Sonoko (who was complaining that she wanted to go shopping), some other classmates of the DB's class and some members of the police. Kogoro was away on a case alone, so he couldn't help.

After two hours of searching Conans glasses finally picked something up that wasn't a badge of the present kids. But when they finally reached the spot, all they found was a trash bag filled with the clothing and belongings that Mitsuhiko had with him the day before. One good point with the clothing was that there was no blood and no cuts on them beside the shredded socks, meaning he wasn't dead when stripped of his belongings.
Conan studied the clothing. Why were his socks shredded? His shoes looked like they were untied and not harmed, but there were some of the sock scraps in them.
"It looks like the socks were shredded by claws while the shoes were worn, but the shoes themselves are unharmed. And the trash bag was intact as well, meaning that no cat or something similar could had shred them after it was put here."
After looking through the other things, he noticed that the clothing were damp, meaning that either Mitsuhiko was sweating much before he got them of or he was soaked by falling into water. The smell of the trash bag would imply it was the former.

For the rest of the day the search brought up nothing. After it was getting dark, the searching stopped. Conan was at the professors while the rest went home.
15512222111111221121.title: The search

155122221111112211211.content:
Conan was in thought about the things he noticed on the trash bag with Mitsuhiko´s belongings, his clothing and some ropes, most likely used to bind him.

"First these binding ropes were still knotted in the bag. Mitsuhiko must have escaped them without untying them. But if they were tight around him, the only way to escape them this way would be to shrink out of them so they would simply fall off.
Second, the clothes look all unharmed except the socks and were damp of sweat. If Mitsuhiko really shrunk out of these ropes he should also have shrunken out of his clothing. If his body changed in another way then only shrinking smaller, the socks could point out that whatever was changing him had changed him into something other than human, maybe a cat by looking at the socks shreds. If the process is nearly as heat generating than shrinking alone, that would also explain the heavy sweating of Mitsuhiko.
Wow, if I hadn't been shrunk myself I would never believe I think that way, it sounds impossible. But if I'm right it will be even harder to find Mitsuhiko because he is smaller and we don't know how he looks right now."
155122221111112211211.title: Thoughts of what happened to Mitsuhiko

1551222211111122112111.content:
What Conan and the other Detective Boys didn't know was that the professor had put a GPS transmitter and a memory chip in their badges when he had last checked them. He had intended that if one of them went missing and their badge turns up then with the data he can track down the whereabouts of the last month. With a bit of luck they could find out where the badge had been since Mitsuhiko´s disappearance. If the kidnappers hadn't changed their location maybe they would find Mitsuhiko this way.

Conan hadn't told anyone what he had deduced about Mitsuhiko´s changes. If he is wrong with it, nobody needs to know what he thought. If they find out where he was brought than he would look out for animals, maybe he was only wrong about the cat part. Or Mitsuhiko had just shrunken down but was still human.
1551222211111122112111.title: Trying to find Mitsuhiko

15512222111111221121111.content:
It had been a week since Mitsuhiko went missing. When the professor had put the GPS in the badges he hadn't tested the program to locate them, ending in a not working program. So he had to fix it and it took some time.
Now he had finally been able to locate where the badge had been between Mitsuhiko walking home and it turning up in that trash bag a day later. So he went with the police to the place where the badge had been longer in between this times. Conan had insisted to come with them and in the end he and Ai had driven with the professor.
15512222111111221121111.title: They find the location

155122221111112211211111.content:
Mitsuhiko was slowly getting calmer in his mind. He had tried as much as he could for the last few days, but there seemed to be no way out and no one came to rescue him. "Even when someone would came looking for me and found out I was here, how would they recognize me as a cat?”
He was losing his hope. He hadn't noticed that he had already lost some smaller parts of himself to the cat, mostly because he had been fighting the other mind and it wasn't anything he could do freely at the moment. He now liked tuna and even had a craving for it. It would seem normal to him to lick himself clean and to hate being wet all over, even not wanting to be near more water than his water bowl. And wearing anything beside something around his neck like the collar also seemed odd to him. He did remember wearing his clothes as a human, but from his new point of view he doesn't remember why he wore them because they were so restricting and uncomfortable. And would someone attack him it also seemed normal to scratch and bite them, not trying to punch or kick.
His memories slowly vanished as well. He had already forgotten some of his classmates who he hadn't done much with and some of the cases he had helped Conan and the DBs to solve where his part was smaller. Some early childhood memories were missing and minor details about his friends vanished from his memories as well.
155122221111112211211111.title: Meanwhile with Mitsuhiko

1551222211111122112111111.content:
When the police alongside Conan, Ai and the professor arrived at the hidden building, they checked a last time that they were at the right location. There was no car or other vehicle near, meaning it was possible empty, but the police knocked at the door anyway. Receiving no answer they kicked the door in before swarming out to look for something.
From what they could say after a couple of minutes the building was really empty. It didn't even look like someone had been here for all least a month. The only clue that there had been someone were tire marks , but that only meant that someone was at the building, not inside.
Conan then found something in the former study. Next to the half-broken bookshelf was an old carpet, covered in dust, but around it some dust was blurred. Without waiting he shoved the carpet away, finding scratch marks on the ground just in front of the bookshelf, showing that it to had been moved sometime ago. With the help of the police the bookshelf was moved away, revealing a staircase to the basement. Without waiting Conan sprinted down the stairs, ignoring the shouts from the policemen behind him that followed quickly while the professor and Ai waited upstairs with two other policemen.
1551222211111122112111111.title: Arriving at the building

15512222111111221121111111.content:
The basement was empty as well but looked more used then the rooms above, a computer still running near a window to the next room. That room behind the window looked more like a living room. On the wall to the side of the window was a door leading into the room. A second door was on the wall to the left, looking like a heavy steel door.
Conan looked through the window first, seeing that the room also held a couple of things used by cats. “Maybe I was right about that Mitsuhiko had changed into a cat. I have to look if there is a cat somewhere inside that room.” With that in mind, Conan opened the door next to the window to enter the room and start searching.
The police following him downstairs had started looking around the first room for clues, one looking at the still running computer. The second door was locked and with it being steel they couldn't kick it in like the front door.
15512222111111221121111111.title: The basement

155122221111112211211111111.content:
Meanwhile Conan had found a sleeping cat in a basket at the back wall of the room. Getting it to wake up wasn't hard, but the result was for Conan to have a scratch mark up his left arm, he wasn't expecting it to do so, still thinking it could be Mitsuhiko. With a small moan of pain Conan was holding his arm while the cat was hissing at him, angry for being woken up by a stranger. Meanwhile Mitsuhiko inside was screaming again, hoping that somehow Conan would recognize him, even if he didn't believe he could. He was shocked that the cat, that had been peaceful until now had attacked Conan.
“Okay, there are two possibilities. For one you are really a normal cat and angry that I woke you up. The second one would be you are Mitsuhiko, but something is subduing your normal self. What now?” While Conan was thinking, the cat slowly laid down again, still hissing at him. Mitsuhiko couldn't believe that Conan already knows that he could be the cat, rising his hopes for being rescued again. But he couldn't do anything to show Conan that he was indeed Mitsuhiko.
After thinking for about five minutes Conan saw that the cat was back to sleep and he had one guess what was subduing Mitsuhiko if the cat really was his friend. He had taken a clearer look at the collar the cat was wearing, seeing that it was something completely electronic. It should be the source of the subduing. But how to remove it before he was scratched again?
The policeman that had looked through the data with the help of the professor and Ai, who had come down after hearing nothing from the others for more than five minutes meanwhile found what Conan had already guessed. Looking shocked at the recorded data and a video of the slowly changing Mitsuhiko into the cat called Shiro. After having seen the whole video from Mitsuhiko waking up to were the cat had been collared Ai took of to look for Conan.
155122221111112211211111111.title: Finding the cat

1551222211111122112111111111.content:
“You will never believe what we found out, Edogawa.”
Looking at her shocked look, he guessed what she had found. “So Mitsuhiko was really changed into a cat?” he asked her, seeming unfazed.
Her look changed from shocked to confused “You have known?”
“I guessed it when I saw the ripped socks in the trash bag. The bindings and clothes could have meant he only had shrunken in size, but the socks were torn like some claws had broken through them. And if the theory is correct that would mean this cat over there is Mitsuhiko, but something is subduing him.”
Ai looked at the cat, still shocked that Conan had already guessed that. “Yeah, that's the cat from the video we saw on the computer. They have recorded the whole change and Mitsuhiko was fighting them after the changes until the put that collar on him.”
“Then there must be a way to remove the collar.” Conan said, still holding his bleeding arm. “I will wrap him in the blanket in the basket and you try to open the collar, okay Haibara?”
With a short nod, Conan slipped his right arm in the basket, carefully so that the cat wouldn't attack him again before he suddenly wrapped it fast, binding the cat in the blanket while also pressing it to his body. The cat had woken up again and was hissing again, but couldn't do anything beside that. Ai looked the collar over, found a hidden button and pushed it.
1551222211111122112111111111.title: What happened to Mitsuhiko

15512222111112.content:
After leaving Mitsuhiko in the room, they observe him to see how the substance works on him.
For the whole next hour there happens nothing and Mitsuhiko doesn't steer in his sleep. What they fail to notice are smaller changes.
The nails on both of Mitsuhikos hands grow slightly sharper and longer. On his face where small whiskers growing, but to transparent to see.
No chance to see on the still dressed boy where the also growing nails on his feet in the same way as on his hands. His hair hides that his ears had grown slightly more triangular and the small lump on his back where a tail grows, only about two or three centimeters by now, was hidden under his pants and shirt. And in his closed mouth where his teeth growing slightly pointier.

"There happens nothing. Either the substance doesn't work or its not working because of the sleeping drug."
"Okay, and what should we do with the boy now?"
"Get the boy to an old, abandoned building near where you got him and let it look like some poor kidnapping from amateurs so that he will easily be found or can escape on his own. When we found the error in the substance, we can kidnap another child. We can only hope he doesn't wake up before he is alone there. We don't need someone looking for us."

And so Mitsuhiko was taken back to Beika, but nobody had noticed the small changes.
15512222111112.title: Mitsuhiko is still asleep

155122221111121.content:
The kidnapper brought the still sleeping Mitsuhiko to an old building two streets away from where he had taken him hours ago. He laid him on a bench in a room without windows but a lockable door. After loosening the binds a bit he left closing but not locking the door so that Mitsuhiko can escape on his own.

Half an hour later Mitsuhiko slowly wakes up. He takes some time to fully remember what had happened. When all was back he was wide awake and started to look for a possible way to escape. Shortly after he registered that the only way out would be the door so he tried opening it. To his surprise the door was unlocked. So he started to look for a way out of the building. It took some time, but he managed to find an exit to the back of the house and from there to the street.

At the same time as Mitsuhiko escapes the room he was brought to Conan tested the upgrade from the professor to increase the range of his radar glasses and found Mitsuhikos dot now in range. They had received a call from his parents that he wasn't home yet hours ago. After Mitsuhiko wasn't in range of the glasses, the professor tried to update the range. With him now in range, the professor drove with Conan to the dot, looking for Mitsuhiko.

The moment Mitsuhiko reaches the street he runs into Conan and the professor that where on their way in to search him.
"Mitsuhiko, you're here and unharmed. What happened?" asked the professor relieved. They turned to go back to the car.
"Conan, professor, I'm glad you're here. I don't know. I remember being grabbed from behind before I got dazed and fall asleep. And that I woke up here in a room that wasn't locked."
With that, they drove to the professors.
155122221111121.title: Mitsuhiko wakes up

1551222211111211.content:
With the adrenalin of the situation wearing off Mitsuhiko falls back asleep in the car rife to the professor.
After arriving Agasa carried him inside and laid him down on the couch. After talking to Ai shortly, which stayed back in her basement lab., Conan laid down on the other couch opposite of Mitsuhiko before falling asleep too. Forgetting to call Mitsuhikos parents now, Agasa covered both boys with blankets before he went to bed.

During the night Mitsuhiko starts to change again. His nails turned claws on his hands and feet grow longer and sharper, slowly pushing his socks to the point that they rip through. Then on the back of his hands grows white fur, while the inside stayed the same. His ears went completely triangular with a soft layer of fur covering them.
The slowly growing tail pushing against his pants, already above his underwear. This causes discomfort to him and adding to that was the slowly growing fur all over his body, with let him break in sweat for the heat. Without waking up Mitsuhiko begins to toss and turn so much that for one his blanket slips away, and two waking up Conan.
Conans first guess was that Mitsuhiko had a nightmare and he went to wake him up. But he stopped short after seeing the black fur on Mitsuhikos face, not that he recognized it as fur at first. After seeing the lump in Mitsuhikos pants, the claws on his hands and through his ripped socks he put two and two together and was shocked.
Whatever happened to Mitsuhiko while he was kidnapped was slowly turning him into an human-animal hybrid, maybe even a full animal. From what Conan could guess, something like a cat.
Shortly later Conan, still in shock, sees Mitsuhikos face slowly push out, forming a muzzle out of his nose and mouth, breaking Conans shock. He tries to wake Mitsuhiko up, but Mitsuhiko didn't wake up, but after a couple of minutes, he calms in his sleep and the changes seem to stop.
1551222211111211.title: At the professors

15512222111112111.content:
Ai had been on her way up to the kitchen to get some coffee around the time Conan tried to wake Mitsuhiko up. She didn't know why Conan was so freaked out, so she headed over to the two boys.
"What happened that you are so freaked out, Edogawa?"
"I don't get Mitsuhiko to wake up and somehow he changed into some kind of animal-human hybrid."
Ai laughs at the comment and looks at Mitsuhiko for the first time after her arrival. What she sees shocked her, Conan was right. Mitsuhikos face was black, looking closer you could see he had fur in his face and something that resembled a muzzle in the center of it.
Conan continued his tries to wake Mitsuhiko up, but it was no use.

After good ten minutes Ai slowly gets over her shock and heads back to her lab. A minute later she comes back with a syringe.
"What do you want with a syringe?"
"Isn't it obvious? Whatever changed him was something he was given when he was kidnapped, so maybe I can find something in his blood that helps us knowing more. I don't think Mitsuhiko can go home looking like that. Maybe if I find something I can work on an antidote to his changes."
With that she takes Mitsuhikos arm to put the syringe in and get the blood. The moment the needle goes through his skin, Mitsuhiko wakes up slowly. Just after having finished taking the blood Ai turns around and walks back to her lab again, not noticing that Mitsuhiko was looking after her.
"What happened?" was all Mitsuhiko asked, making Conan jump in surprise. His voice was a little deeper and raspier then normal.
"You are finally awake. Did you have a nightmare or something like that?"
"I don't remember having a dream at all. But why is it so warm in here?" With that, Mitsuhiko slowly sits up.
"There is something I need to tell you Mitsuhiko. Whatever this kidnappers did to you, it wasn't just putting you to sleep and bring you to that building. They must have given you something, maybe a drug or something like that, only it seems that the effect was delayed. While you were asleep you started changing into some kind of cat-human hybrid."

Mitsuhiko, like Ai before, started laughing before he looks down at his hands and gasps in shock seeing the white fur on them. "You weren't lying."
After getting over the first shock, Mitsuhiko slowly stands up. Standing in a ray of moonlight, Mitsuhiko looks himself over. Noticing the claws looking out of his socks, he takes them off. His feet were similar to his hands covered in white fur. Piece by piece, Mitsuhiko takes his clothes off. Beneath his shirt he his whole upper body was covered in fur, black on his back, sides and arms while white on his chest and belly. His legs beneath his pants were similar to his arms covered in black fur and after taking them off completely a black tail with a white tip could be seen behind him.

"What now?" was all he asked after mustering himself a couple of minutes, standing in his fur coat and only his underwear.
15512222111112111.title: A short while later

155122221111121111.content:
"Haibara took a blood sample from you, Mitsuhiko. Maybe she will find something that could help you to change back."
Mitsuhiko looked skeptical at Conan "How and why should Haibara find something?"
"She has experience with biology and chemistry. If whatever changed you is in your bloodstream, she will find it. And if not, maybe she has another idea where to look for a source."

Half an hour later Conan & Mitsuhiko went down to Haibara. She was at her computer searching for something.
"And, any luck?" Conan asked. "There is something that is not normal to a human bloodstream, but I don't know if it is the cause of your changes or something that was produced by your body after the changes. Maybe its a protein that a cat or your hybrid body needs to survive."
"So nothing fix. Did you need something other from me then my blood?" Mitsuhiko sounded calm, but he was far from it.
"Maybe it would help me to have a couple of hairs from you to look at your DNA. Best would be both, some hairs from now and some from before you started changing."
"Okay, but where do we find older hairs from before the changes?" Mitsuhiko asked.
"We will look at your clothes from today. If there aren't any hairs we have to look for a hairbrush or comb." Conan explained.
With that Mitsuhiko cut a couple of his hairs for Haibara before he and Conan went upstairs to look at his clothes. Luckily they found some on his jacket and brought them down to Haibara as well. After that they waited in the living room for Haibara and hoped that she would find something.
155122221111121111.title: What now

155332222111122112222221.title: Animals then

155332222111122112222221221.content:
It had been a month since Heiji Hattori had been shrunken like Shinichi and Shiho. He had stumbled into a case with someone from the black organization involved. Similar to Shinichi's case with the roller-coaster, the man had been at the wrong place to end up as a suspect.

After successfully solving the case, Heiji had been stupid enough to follow the man alone. He wanted to help Conan with the organization and had not noticed that he himself had been followed by another person. Said person had knocked him out in an dark alley and forced an APTX-pill down his throat. After that he had left Heiji alone to die, only for Heiji to shrunk like the others.

Because of lying in an dark alley he hadn't been found around the time he woke up. Luckily for Heiji they didn't take his phone and feeling a little weak himself, he decided to call Conan for help. He didn't took notice of his smaller hands or his longer sleeves, but because he wore a shirt with short sleeves they didn't block his hands.
Finally having dialed Conan's phone he put it up to his ear, still without noticing his smaller state.
“Hey, Hattori, where are you? I thought you were on your way to the professor?”
“I was... “ finally noting something was off Heiji looked more closely at his hands. All that Conan heard over the phone was a scream that sounded much to young for Hattori.

After that Conan started looking for Heiji with the professor the way he should have come. Luckily they found him quickly in that alley that was near his original way to them. There wasn't any bystanders, meaning nobody had heard Heiji's screaming or they hadn't bothered for a screaming child. When they reached him, there was sitting a child around Conan's age with over-sized clothes and still in a shock. The professor had to carry him back to his house while Conan took the things left behind. He put the now over-sized pants in the backpack along with Heiji's phone before shouldering said backpack and taking his shoes.
It took more than an hour for Heiji to come back to his senses. The professor had bandaged his head where he was been hit before while Conan had gotten something for him to wear of his things. Ai had taken a blood sample after they arrived.

Since that day Heiji had lived with the professor and Haibara, using the name of Akira Hikawa. He had joined the Detective Boys shortly after joining their class, certainly not on his own will. Much like Conan and Ai, he had been forced into the group.
To anyone who knows Heiji, he was out helping Shinichi with his case.
155332222111122112222221221.title: How Heiji shrunk

1553322221111221122222212211.content:
That all happened two months ago.
Today the six Detective Boys had been exploring an old abandoned building in Beika, not that Conan, Akira and Ai wanted to go. But even now that there were even numbers between real kids and shrunken ones, the kids still decided to go after a draw and Conan didn't want them to go alone, so in the end they would go all.
They looked in every room of the building for something that could be interesting, but found nothing in the upper parts of it. What they didn't notice was that they watched by hidden cameras in the whole area.
Finally in one of the last basement rooms Mitsuhiko found something that could mean someone had been held captive here and called the rest to look for clues. Just after they were all in the room the door closed with a loud bang, startling them all. The door, an old iron door hadn't any handle, so after calming the kids down they tried to push the door open. It didn't move, they were trapped in the room. Conan didn't want to try kicking the door open with his ball because if it didn't push the door open it would bounce with much force so that it could hurt someone.
Having no reception with their phones didn't help them any further, so they started looking for a way to open the door. They had told nobody where they would go, so for the next hours nobody would start looking for them. And even if they started looking, the only person who could find them here was the professor if he used the spare glasses from Conan.
While they explored the room they didn't notice the quiet hissing sound. Only when Ayumi passed out out of nowhere they took their surrounding in and heard the hissing. But that was far to late, one by one, the rest of them passed out. First after Ayumi was Ai before Conan and Akira passed out nearly simultaneous. Before Mitsuhiko could start to panic much he had collapsed too. Genta was the last one, probably because he had more body mass then the rest but even he finally hit the floor out cold.

Shortly after, someone opened the door. The person wore a gas mask to breath, the sleeping gas not entirely sucked out off the room yet. He gave each off the six children an injection with a syringe before leaving the room without closing the door fully. If the drug he had injected them work like it should, they wouldn't tell anyone. If not they can leave the room and aren't any wiser what happened in there. In front of the door laid an old stone pillar that they should think blocked the door for some time.
1553322221111221122222212211.title: Exploring something

15533222211112211222222122111.content:
When Conan woke up, he at first didn't know what happened to him. Where he was or what he did before being here, groggily sitting up.
He noticed the others, all still asleep but slowly waking up. Looking around he slowly remembered. The old building, the room in the basement, the heavy door that had shut behind them and wouldn't open and finally them all falling unconscious. But now the door was open slightly.
Conan got up looking if there was someone outside the door, only to find the pillar laying next to the door. “Had the pillar toppled over, shutting the door? When that was the case, how did it move away?”
By the time Conan returned into the room the others were all awake. Genta and Ayumi were slowly sitting up, Mitsuhiko and Ai were already sitting and Akira was moving around, heading to the door.
“What happened? Why is the door open again?”
“I don't know for sure, but just behind the door laid an old stone pillar. Maybe it toppled over and blocked the door after we entered. But why it isn't blocking the door anymore I don't know. And if the hissing we heard before was sleeping gas to knock us all out I'm not sure. But we should leave that building before something else happens.”
15533222211112211222222122111.title: Waking up again

155332222111122112222221221111.content:
So shortly after they all were leaving the room. On their way out they didn't notice what had already started to happen to them. All of them had their ears slowly moving upwards while growing more triangular, sprouting a small fur coat on them that hid them in their hair mostly.
It wasn't until Genta scratched himself that they noticed something was off. Genta had cried and the others look at him, noticing that he had a bloody scratch on his right cheek. Next to it as his hand, his nails slightly sharper and bloody too.
“Genta, I think you should cut your finger nails when you get home” said Mitsuhiko. Before Genta could respond anything Ayumi noticed that her own nails were to sharp too. “I don't think that's Genta's fault, Mitsuhiko. I cut my nails yesterday and they are sharp too. And yours look not better.”
They all looked down at their hands, noticing all similar sharp nails. When Akira looked back up, he noticed something else. “What happened to your ears, Conan?” Looking confused at Akira Conan touched the side of his head, finding nothing where his ears should be. Moving his hands up further he found them in his hair, but not in the same form as before. “What?”
The others soon discovered that they had the same problem so they all panicked a bit. What was happening to them? Had someone done something to them while they were unconscious in that room?
155332222111122112222221221111.title: The first changes

choices: Changes to their size, hands and face
1553322221111221122222212211111.content:
They had easily identified their new ears resembled that of a cat while also noticing they weren't fake ones. And in combination with the ears the sharper nails could be explained as a change too, meaning that they could change further. Because they didn't want other people see them change, they decided to stay in the building in another room near the entrance if something else happened. Only this room had no door and open windows, meaning they could escape it easily. If they didn't change further they could leave the building later.
On their way over to the room Akira's feet started to hurt. He couldn't ignore it for long, so he was the first to remove his shoes and socks. Akira looked shocked to see his feet growing rounder before his eyes while his toes shrunk back into his feet. His little toes vanished completely into his feet and the other toe-nails grew sharper, changing into cat-claws.
Hearing Akira's following gasp the others turn to see what happened. They all had noticed a little pain from their feet, but had ignored it until they saw Akira's feet. The others quickly tried to took their own shoes and socks off, but while Ai and Ayumi had been fast enough Conan's, Mitsuhiko's and Genta's socks had already ripped open and turned into shreds in their shoes. Shortly after that their feet had deformed into naked paws, reduced to four toes each and with already completely formed claws at the end. Lastly there grew paw-pads on their feet, finishing the form of naked paws.
They quickly took their shoes and went into their chosen room were Conan took out his phone to call the professor, explaining what seemed to happen to them and asking him to get here as fast as he can. Hopefully he wouldn't be to late and only find cats when he arrived.
1553322221111221122222212211111.title: The changes continue

choices: Still shrinking, but growing a tail
15533222211112211222222122111111.content:
While they were waiting they all were in deep thought, so they didn't notice that they started to shrink in size. Normally Genta was the biggest, Mitsuhiko the second and the rest was around the same height. But by now Genta and Mitsuhiko were the same height as the others and all were further shrinking. Genta only took notice of his shrinking when suddenly his shirt slipped down his body. He hadn't only shrunken in size, but also in weight, reducing his belly to the point were his shirt collar could just slip down. Under that he looked more like the others now, really slim compared to his old weight. That got the attention of the others and by looking at each other, they know that Genta wasn't the only one smaller than before.
“If the professor isn't here soon he will only find cats.” Ai stated, looking down at her hands as they start to change. Their fingers started shortening while the nails grew further out. Their thumps vanished, leaving their hands just like their feet. And when the fingers finally stopped shortening and the paw-pads had grown the looked exactly like their feet did.
At the same time Ayumi noticed that their faces were slowly pushing out, forming a small muzzle from their nose and mouth and including their teeth to sharpen as well. Then all of the sudden she could feel something poking out from her cheeks and by reaching up to feel it, she found there had grown small whiskers.
15533222211112211222222122111111.title: Changes to their size, hands and face

155332222111122112222221221111111.content:
A minute or so after the muzzles had formed they all had finally stripped of any remaining clothes even when turning a bit red from embarrassment for being naked. But most of their clothes would not fit them anymore anyway because of the shrinking.
Shortly after Genta's shirt had slipped down the others were in similar situations than him, leaving their upper bodies bare. Their pants wouldn't slip down as long as they remained sitting, but were also much to big now that they had shrunken to half their original size and were still shrinking. So they had removed them and their underwear which was far to big too.
Sitting there they all felt uncomfortable when suddenly a tail begun to sprout from above their rear. Like the rest of their changed body the tail was naked as fur hadn't started to grow.
Next one after another they yelled in pain when with a loud crack from their spine their backs switched from bipedal to quadrupedal. When Conan, who was the first who's back cracked, tried to get up he fell down an all fours and they all took notice that while they had been sitting the length of their arms and legs had adjusted to each other by shortening their legs.
"Now we really look like cats except we didn't have a fur and are still a bit to big, but we are still shrinking slowly, meaning it won't take much longer until we reach our final size. Hopefully we can still talk after we finish changing” was Conan's dry comment from his position.
155332222111122112222221221111111.title: Still shrinking, but growing a tail

choices: Getting to learn walking on all fours
1553322221111221122222212211111111.content:
And Conan was right. A couple of minutes later he, Ai and Akira stopped shrinking at the same size, while Ayumi, Genta and Mitsuhiko shrunk a little further, leaving them about 5 centimeters shorter then the other three. “Does this mean whatever was given to us countered the APTX?” was thought by Conan, Akira and Ai simultaneous. Luckily the three others didn't ask them if they know why they were bigger then them. Maybe they hadn't noticed it yet.
Finally it was the time were all of them feeling an itching all around their body with indicated the start of growing fur. And the fur was the second thing beside their size to slightly distinguish them.
Conan's fur was completely black, the only exception were his four paws and a small strip over his eyes, which were white instead.
Akira looked very similar to Conan, he was also a black furred cat, but beside his also white paws he had white tips on his ears and his tail.
Mitsuhiko had also a black and white fur-coat growing in. Beside his four paws his whole front from his chin down to his tail were white, while his back, legs and tail itself were black.
Genta's fur was orange instead of black. His tail was a lot bushier than that of the others and had a white tip. Other than that only his front paws and his chest had white fur.
Ai had grown a grey and black striped fur-coat, looking like a little silver tiger. Her paws were all grey furred while her tail was completely black.
Ayumi was the only one with a tricolored fur-coat. While her four paws, her chest and belly were white furred, her tail and the left side of her face were orange. The right side of her face was covered in black fur, which continued on her back with the exception of some orange spots.
When the growing fur finally stopped they all looked themselves over before looking at the others. They now looked completely like cats, the only thing unchanged was their eyes.
1553322221111221122222212211111111.title: Sprouting fur

15533222211112211222222122111111111.content:
They were cats with human eyes and had also kept their normal hairstyle and face form, only overgrown by the fur.
“I can't believe it, we are cats.” said Mitsuhiko stunned.
“Hopefully we can still talk normal and have our minds completely intact.” Conan commented dryly.
“We are talking normal, Conan” replied Genta irritated.
“I think Conan meant we don't know if we talk normal because there is no normal human here. Maybe while we think we talk human in reality others would say we are meowing like normal cats do” explained Akira as dryly as Conan.
Now Ayumi, Genta and Mitsuhiko looked shocked to the others. “You mean it could be that nobody will understand us?” asked Ayumi quietly.
“Its possible. But even if that's a problem for now maybe the professor can invent something for us that translates our voices back to human language. Hopefully he is here soon” answered Conan before slowly getting up. “We should at least try to learn to walk in our new bodies, not that someone captures us to put us in an animal shelter or something like that.” With that he made some small, unstable steps. After a couple of minutes he got it, getting faster over time.
The others followed his example, and even when Genta collapsed for the sixth time they all didn't give up. For him it was more difficult because the missing weight threw his balance off.
15533222211112211222222122111111111.title: Getting to learn walking on all fours
