1553322221122221222122.content: Does the change have to do with their size?
1553322221122221222122.title: Size

15533222211222212221221.content: Do they grow or shrink?
15533222211222212221221.title: Yes

155332222112222122212212.content:
It was not a normal day for the Detective Boys. Today Ayumi was sick at home and Ai was away with Agasa. With no case to solve for them, the three boys had nothing to do.
At the moment they were at Agasas house to play some games. While Conan and Genta were playing a few rounds alone after Genta had played a couple of rounds with Mitsuhiko while Conan had waited.
Mitsuhiko had gone into the working area and found something that had attracted his interest. It was something that looked like it was build recently with a manual of what it should do near it. After reading that it should be a shrinking device, Mitsuhiko grins to himself.
"With that I could get Conan and Genta away so that both Ayumi and Ai will finally see me."
Lately Mitsuhiko was really jealous of Conan that both girls had only eyes for him and Genta was just annoying with his ever hungry being.
He tried the device on a couple of things on the workbench by shrinking and growing them before he thinks of a plan and what he should do with the boys after shrinking them.

"Okay, so I can just hit them with the device to shrink them down, but that gives three things to think of. First, what to say where they are? Maybe I can say I wasn't with them today and then they had gone missing in a case. I would help searching them, but we will find nothing. Second, to what size should I shrink them? A couple centimeters? Big enough for me to see them but small enough to keep them hidden and from reaching things that could help them. Third, what to do with them? I don't know how loud the could be in a shrunken state, so keeping them could be dangerous if someone sees or hears them, but that is something i must see after shrinking them. If I keep them, what to to with them? Put them somewhere like a cage or box and have fun with them? Keeping them hidden from prying eyes? Find a way to keep them in one place? Maybe I can glue their feet to something. That would also stop them from running away. Maybe I should knock them out with Conans watch so I can set everything up."

With his mind set he started to look for the reserve watch of Conan and the darts to fill them in. After finding them, he starts to approach the two boys still playing. Just as Genta wins the round, Mitsuhiko hits him with the dart from the watch before reloading it. Genta hasn't even noticed the dart and the sting, so Conan had no warning before he was hit by the second dart. "What...?" was all he said before falling asleep. With both boys out, Mitsuhiko starts working on his plan.
First he gets the shoes of them both and puts them on their feet. Next he took the shrinking device and set it to fifty centimeters and hit both boys with it.
After they had shrunken down to that size, Mitsuhiko took of their shoes and Conans jacket off again. Then he takes glue from the workbench and starts to glue their clothing to their bodies. Their socks to the feet, their pants to the legs and their shirts to the upper body. Next he put glue in their shoes before putting them on their feet again. He even put glue on the inside of Conans jacket an puts it on him again.
After that he sets the device to three centimeters and aims at them before firing. After having reached this small size, Mitsuhiko glues the soles of their shoes to a small metal plate so that they could not move their feet to run.
Now they looked like small action figures that where movable. Then Mitsuhiko starts to play a round alone while the boys where still asleep.
155332222112222122212212.title: Shrinking

1553322221122221222122121.content:
Shortly after Mitsuhiko starts the game round, Conan woke up. The first thing he noticed was how stiff his body and his clothing were. The clothes were more restricting and uncomfortable then ever. If he had to describe his feeling for the clothes, he would say they feel like they were glued to his body.
Before opening his eyes, he tries moving his body. He could wiggle his toes, feeling his socks around them. Wiggling his feet he could feel he was wearing his shoes again, but his shoes felt a lot more heavy then they should, so he couldn't move them around, making his feet and legs nearly unmovable. His hands were free to move around, but with his stiff arms that was also limited.
Opening his eyes he could see he was lying on a dark, hard surface, most likely on the ground. He saw something big in front of him but didn't recognize what it could be.
Then there was the sound of screeching tires, similar to that of the game he and Genta had played.
He remembered playing with Genta before something had pricked him in the neck. After that there was nothing, he had fallen asleep. "Just like I was hit with the darts of my watch."
But that would rise questions. Who would hit him with a dart from his watch? Wasn't the only people in the house Genta, Mitsuhiko and him? And where are the two others?
Looking around he couldn't see them, and turning wasn't possible to his heavy feet. He tried looking why his shoes where so heavy by moving his head slightly forward, but only sees some large object near his soles, looking like it was leaning against his feet.

What he didn't see was that Genta was also waking up, but the two of them were lying back to back with some distance, so Genta likewise couldn't see Conan.
Genta felt similar to Conan how restricting his clothes were. Also he noticed how heavy his feet were, slowly registering he had his shoes on. He couldn't see his feet because of his belly, but there was something large lying by his feet. In front of him he could see a large, empty area.

Both of them realized that they were not gaged and beside being stiff from the clothes, they were not shackled in any way. Genta could see that his Detective Boys badge was missing, while Conan tried to find his within his pockets with no luck.

Just then, Mitsuhiko finished his game round and turned to look at the boys, not that they saw his face for him sitting ahead of their feet.
1553322221122221222122121.title: The boys wake up

choices: Let them see what happend to them
15533222211222212221221211.content:
While Mitsuhiko looked at Conan & Genta he noticed that both of them moved a little. While Genta moves only his head to look around him, Conan tried to reach the pockets of his jacket like he is searching for something. "Probably his DB-badge."
But Conan couldn't find it because Mitsuhiko had taken both of their badges. He had also switched Conans watch with the reserve one he had used to send them to sleep, so Conan had no darts in his watch. He was sure that Conans belt was empty because of him using his ball yesterday and even if he had a ball he couldn't kick them because of the glued down shoes, making this weapon of his useless.

After watching them for a coupöe of minutes he decides to speak with them. "Ah, you are awake."
Conan & Genta stopped moving before asking at the same time "Mitsuhiko?". And because they had heard each other they also asked each other "Genta?" "Conan?"
Mitsuhiko hadn't heard their words, only seeing their lips moving while both thought that Mitsuhiko was way to loud for a normal situation.

"So they are so small I can't hear them speaking. Maybe I should grow them a bit back to see when I can hear them. If I keep the shrinking device I can shrink them down again if I need to. I will grow them back cm for cm to the point I hear them speaking again."

With that Mitsuhiko took the device again from its spot next to him, setting it to 4cm before hitting them with it.
For both the boys it was an weird feeling as the device hit them, not that they know what it was or where it come from. They only saw the ground moving a bit under them while they felt like they slide on it. "What was that for a weird feeling?" asked Genta after they stopped growing while Conan said nothing but looking thoughtful.
Seeing Genta speaking but not hearing him Mitsuhiko tried again with 5cm. No difference to before. With 6 cm he could hear them, but only if he bowed his head down to them, with was a little uncomfortable to him. Trying 7cm, he could move back his head, but not sit normal to hear them. Finally at 8cm he was able to hear them without moving nearer to them even if they where really quiet.

"Okay, so if I need to hide them with nobody hearing them I can shrink them to 5cm or I can shrink them to 6cm and hear them if they are nearer to my head. But keeping them in the front pocket of my shirt could expose them if they moved and if someone is near me he could hear them there too. Something I should think for a solution later."
15533222211222212221221211.title: Mitsuhiko speaks with them

155332222112222122212212111.content:
"Can you hear me?" Mitsuhiko asked, knowing that they had heard him before.
"Yes, we can hear you. Why are you so loud?" answered Conan for them both.
"So their ears are more sensitive now" thought Mitsuhiko before answering a little quieter "Sorry, I didn't thought about it before. How do you two feel?"
"I feel stiff all over, like I'm wearing an armor or something similar. I can't move my legs and there is something really heavy keeping them in place." Conan responded. Genta only agreed with Conan. "Where are we and what happened?"
"We are still at the professors house."
"But I didn't recognize anything around me. The ceiling is to high up to be in a normal house and whatever is in front of me looks like something gigantic." Conan was confused. Why did he not recognize it if he really was in the house of the professor.

"And to your second question, I will just show you." With that, Mitsuhiko carefully picked up Genta with two fingers of his left hand and Conan with his right hand. Both of them were scared for being touched by something that big to them and also being lifted from the ground that easily while they themselves couldn't really move. But that was nothing compared to the shock when Mitsuhiko turned them around so they could see each other and the gigantic Mitsuhiko next to them, grinning.

After putting them down on there feet, forced to stand by the metal plates and their stiff legs, Mitsuhiko waited for their reactions after that shock.
155332222112222122212212111.title: Let them see what happend to them

1553322221122221222122121111.content:
It took several minutes for them both to let sink that in. Conan combined what happened to them "Why have only Genta and me shrunken down so small, why is there some plate at our feet and why are you smiling like that, Mitsuhiko?"
"Well, the reason you have shrunken down is that I hit you with a shrinking device I have found. The plate is there to keep you in place, I don't want you to try running away."
Genta and Conan both looked shocked at their friends explanation. "But why?"
"I'm jealous of you Conan. Both Ayumi and Ai have only eyes for you. With you not there, I hope they will finally notice me more. And for you Genta, you are always babbling about food, that's really annoying."
"You know that I don't have any interest in Ayumi or Haibara, right?"
"Yes, but that doesn't help if they still look at you all the times." That silenced Conan, while Genta was still shocked. Mitsuhiko thought he was that annoying to just put him aside like that?

After nearly ten minutes of silence between them, Conan finally asked "And what now? What do you plan to do?"
"I will keep you that small and immobile, maybe even shrink you more so that nobody hears you. When I meet with Ayumi and Ai and they ask, I will say I didn't was with you today. I think they will want to search for you, but with no clues what happened with you, they will give up eventually."
"Have you ever thought about what will happen to us? We will starve to death. And with not being able to walk, how do we go to the toilet?"
"Oh, I will find a way to let you eat. I can still shrink food for you or give you some crumbs. For you, they would be way bigger then normal food would be. But I haven't thought about the toilet part. It will be hard not only because of you couldn't walk or have it in your size, but also because I glued your pants on your legs. You can't take them off that easily."
"You ... have glued our clothes to us?" inquired Genta.
"Yes, I have glued your clothes. You will not be able to slip out of your glued down shoes, or even your socks. You can't take off your pants or shirts, and Conans jacket is glued to him as well."
"So that's why we are so stiff, the glue hardened in the clothes so they are nearly unmovable for us."
"Well, I will look if I find a solution for your toilet problem. I don't want someone to find you by smelling you." With that, Mitsuhiko stands up to walk over to the computer, taking the shrinking device with him, just to be save. He intended to look in the Internet for a solution. To Conan and Genta it felt like an earthquake as Mitsuhiko walks away. But even with the shaking they both kept standing by the to them heavy plates.
1553322221122221222122121111.title: Reactions

choices: A way to get the drug
15533222211222212221221211111.content:
"Conan, any idea what we can do to escape him? I still can't believe what he did to us."
"Sorry Genta, right now I have no idea. The only way for us to move would be to either get out of the shoes or to get in a handstand and walk on our hands. But the first is impossible because of the glue, we would tear our feet away trying. And the second would mean we have to lift the plates from the ground. And to us, they weigh way to much to achieve that. Even if we did get them lifted, walking on our hands with that weigh would be nearly impossible I think." But his mind was running to find a solution for them to escape Mitsuhiko.

While Conan was thinking of an escape plan, Mitsuhiko had started the computer and was looking for a solution for their problem. So far he had found two ways to keep them from needing a toilet.
For one solution Mitsuhiko would have to diaper both Conan and Genta. But that was nothing he wanted to do. It would mean he had to change them frequently and even if he could overpower them easily with his size they could keep struggling. He also didn't want to use the watch on them to often because he wouldn't get new darts without telling the professor why he needed them. Not to forget the costs of repeatedly buying new diapers. Even if he could just shrink the diapers in the shop and take them secretly he didn't want to steal from someone that way.
The other solution was a drug to reduce their metabolism. That would not only help with the toilet problem but also reduce the amount of food they would need, even if at their size that was already little. He only didn't know how the normal dose would affect their shrunken bodies.
That was something he would need to test. The problem was how would he get the drug? He couldn't order them online and if a child like him could get them in a pharmacy was also not guaranteed. And he couldn't ask someone other without explaining why he would need that drug.
15533222211222212221221211111.title: Solutions

info.brief_description: The characters of Detective Conan are about to experience some changes
info.description:
I thought it was about time to get back in the game, and I decided to do it with a new story. I always liked Detective Conan so I decided to use it for a story. Let's put a few rules;
1) Sex is allowed, but let's not put to many details ( I did rated it 13+)
2) Use decent grammar
3) Let's have fun
